title: It Gives Me Confidence
detail_text: <:th_ch0006/>Lala~, lalala~♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Hmm, I wonder if this is good enough?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Yeah, it’s really good!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Uwaaah! Honoka, how long have you been there?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Umm, since you began playing this one song on the piano, I guess?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>That means you’ve been listening from the start!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Ehehe, sorry. You were so focused that it’s hard to talk to you.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Geez. So, how was it? The song. I’m not sure yet if I’ll go with the current melody for the chorus, but--<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>It was the best! Just hearing it makes me feel excited and want to jump around♪ I also love the chorus’ melody! I want to sing this song!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>....Fufu, if you say so, Honoka, then I guess it should be okay.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
